org.stanwood.podcaster.audio
Interface IAudioFile

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAudioFile, MP3File, MP4File, WavFile
public interface IAudioFile

This interface should be extended by classes used to represent audio files. It is used to write meta data to these files.

Method Summary
 java.io.File getFile()
          Used to get the raw java file object of the audio file

          Used to get the format of the file
